justification: Fails to model B’s needs: B values dual‑threat QBs and is 0-8; trading away their only healthy dual‑threat (Jones) for a pocket QB hurts their identity and win-now outlook. Asking for Eric Torres (Tier 1, healthy) while offering two rookies (Tier 3 and Tier 5) is unlikely to appeal, despite B liking rookies. No mention of B’s injury aversion or roster impact. The trade is technically feasible but strategically lopsided toward A. p_accept_B=0.62 is unrealistic.
